textBeforeTable: Uploaded Files:    The Burbank Public Library publishes a monthly newsletter, Library News & Events, with up-to-date programming information and library news. In addition to the printed newsletter, the library can send you the E-News, which briefly highlights programs for the upcoming month. To subscribe to the E-News, send a request to: burbankpubliclibrary@burbankca.gov.  August 2015 Library News and Events Library Newsletter Read the Blog Make a Suggestion Renew/Reserve Use the Internet Get a Library Card Find an Article Find a Book Go to My Account I Want To...
